title: Fawad condoles demise of legendary actor Umer Sharif
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 02 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Saturday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the sad demise of veteran comedian Umer Sharif.
In a tweet, the minister said the actor, who always distributed smiles on the faces of people of all ages, has left for his eternal abode.
He said the nation paid the best tribute to its artist talent and proved that they love art and artists.
He remarked that Umer Sharifâ€™s name would always be written in golden letters in the encyclopedia of fine arts of Pakistan.
